title: Russian prosecutors accuse Britain of leading anti-Russia campaign
text:
Russian prosecutors accuse Britain of leading anti-Russia campaign 12:47pm BST - 00:47 
The Deputy Prosecutor-General of Russia, Saak Karapetian, says Britain has portrayed the poisoning of ex-spy Sergei Skripal and his daughter in a ''provocative way'' and accused them of leading an anti-Russia campaign. Rough cut (no reporter narration). ▲ Hide Transcript ▶ View Transcript 
The Deputy Prosecutor-General of Russia, Saak Karapetian, says Britain has portrayed the poisoning of ex-spy Sergei Skripal and his daughter in a "provocative way" and accused them of leading an anti-Russia campaign.
